name: AdoraHop
description:
Welcome to AdoraHop, which is a delightful platform-jumper.

GAMEPLAY

You start out as a cute dog and need to reach as high as possible.
On your way you collect lots of coins, which you can exchange for other cool animals to use.

There's no advantage over using one or another, so you can play with which one you like the most.

The game offers you along with other features:

  • Highscorelist
  •  Several unlockables
  • Infinite gameplay
  • Cute soundeffects

HELP THE GAME

Comment your opinion after playing it and let me know what to improve!

Enjoy!
